Area Deprivation Index Score

Source: R/data.R
ADI.Rd

Area Deprivation Index Score data. More information is available at https://adni.loni.usc.edu/data-samples/adni-data/

Usage

data(ADI)

Format

A data frame with 873 observations and 19 variables.

Source

https://adni.loni.usc.edu/data-samples/adni-data/

Details

  • ORIGPROT character Original study protocol , with options: ADNI3, ADNI4, ADNI2, ADNIGO, ADNI1

  • COLPROT factor Study protocol of data collection , with factor levels: ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2, ADNI3, ADNI4

  • PTID character Participant ID

  • RID numeric Participant roster ID Range value: 21, ..., 10618

  • VISCODE character Visit code , with options: 4_init, 4_bl, 4_m12

  • VISCODE2 character Translated visit code

  • ADIDATE Date of collection: Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • STATE character State: 1=Alabama; 10=Georgia; 11=Hawaii; 12=Idaho; 13=Illinois; 14=Indiana; 15=Iowa; 16=Kansas; 17=Kentucky; 18=Louisiana; 19=Maine; 2=Alaska; 20=Maryland; 21=Massachusetts; 22=Michigan; 23=Minnesota; 24=Mississippi; 25=Missouri; 26=Montana; 27=Nebraska; 28=Nevada; 29=New Hampshire; 3=Arizona; 30=New Jersey; 31=New Mexico; 32=New York; 33=North Carolina; 34=North Dakota; 35=Ohio; 36=Oklahoma; 37=Oregon; 38=Pennsylvania; 39=Rhode Island; 4=Arkansas; 40=South Carolina; 41=South Dakota; 42=Tennessee; 43=Texas; 44=Utah; 45=Vermont; 46=Virginia; 47=Washington; 48=West Virginia; 49=Wisconsin; 5=California; 50=Wyoming; 51=District of Columbia; 6=Colorado; 7=Connecticut; 8=Delaware; 9=Florida Decoded Value: Yes

  • ADISTATE numeric State Decile Score: Range value: 0, ..., 10

  • ADINATIONAL character National Percentile:

  • ADIREV character Has the participant moved since their last visit? 0=No; 1=Yes; 2=Not applicable Decoded Value: Yes

  • ID numeric Record ID Range value: 49, ..., 82167

  • SITEID numeric Site ID Range value: 2, ..., 941

  • USERDATE User Create Date Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • USERDATE2 User Last Modify Date Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • DD_CRF_VERSION_LABEL character CRF Version Label , with options: v1, v2

  • LANGUAGE_CODE character Language Code e=English Decoded Value: Yes

  • HAS_QC_ERROR character Has Quality Check Error 0=Does not have QC error or QC error has been approved; 1=Has QC error Decoded Value: Yes

  • update_stamp POSIXct: YYY-MM-DD

Author

adni-data@googlegroups.com
